backend/main.mo: Defines survey and career types, static career data, and a function to generate career recommendations based on survey results.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping new survey and recommendation features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries of key frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode values, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component wiring navigation, sections, and global state provider.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat input form handling text entry, Enter-to-send, and disabled/loading states.
Displays chat messages with auto-scroll, avatars, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Generic section wrapper supporting decorations, muted background, and reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll effects, desktop links, and a collapsible mobile menu that triggers section navigation.
frontend/src/components/motion/Reveal.ts: Wrapper component that animates children into view using intersection observer and configurable animation styles.
frontend/src/components/recommendations/: Displays a single career recommendation with title, description, required skills, education, and match reasons.
frontend/src/components/sections/CareerA: Manages the career assistant chat flow, handling states for survey completion, chat start, skipped chat, and rendering chat UI or prompts.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Footer with branding, about text, contact link, disclaimer, and decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Landing section with branding, intro text, and feature cards encouraging users to start the survey.
frontend/src/components/sections/Recomme: Computes skill scores from survey answers and displays career recommendations or guidance messages based on user progress.
frontend/src/components/sections/SurveyS: Section that renders the career survey and saves answers upon completion.
frontend/src/components/sections/Technol: Presents a three-card section explaining rule-based logic, multi-criteria analysis, and AI guidance with animations and icons.
frontend/src/components/survey/CareerSur: Implements a multi-step career survey managing user answers, navigation, validation, and completion state.
frontend/src/components/survey/steps/Int: Renders selectable activity preferences with icons, allowing toggling of multiple choices.
Provides a list of interest categories with icons, enabling multi-select via checkboxes.
frontend/src/components/survey/steps/Lea: Offers radio-based selection of preferred learning styles with descriptions.
frontend/src/components/survey/steps/Per: Displays personality trait options with descriptions, supporting multi-select behavior.
frontend/src/components/survey/steps/Ski: Shows a list of skills as checkbox options for multi-selection.
frontend/src/components/survey/steps/Wor: Provides radio options for selecting a preferred work environment with descriptions.
Lets users choose important work values from icon-labeled checkbox options.
frontend/src/components/survey/SurveyPro: Displays survey step progress and percentage using a progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating and refetching dependent queries when it updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login flow, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: A React hook using IntersectionObserver to report when an element enters the viewport, with options for threshold, root margin, and one-time triggering.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching career recommendations, managing career chat actions, and polling career messages through an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining light/dark themes, color tokens, utility classes, and reduced-motion behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/state/careerFlowStore.tsx: Context store managing survey answers, flow state, and chat session identifiers for the career guidance process.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the projectâ€™s purpose, architecture, existing features, and versioned state for the Career Path Finder app.
